item.title: OSU League 2020/2021 - RSA 1 Writeup
item.description: So, to start off, I knew pretty much nothing about cryptography and assumed that it was probably all black magic before this, but after spending 3 days on this challenge asking for help and googling everything I could, I can now say with abosulte certainty that my assumptions are correct.
